query:
SELECT
    id,
    uri,
    title,
    (
        SELECT
            GROUP_CONCAT(t.name, ',' ORDER BY t.name ASC)
        FROM
            tags t
            JOIN bookmark_tags bt ON t.id = bt.tag_id
        WHERE
            bt.bookmark_id = b.id
    ) AS "tags: String",
    updated_at
FROM
    bookmarks b
WHERE
    uri LIKE ?
    AND title LIKE ?
ORDER BY
    updated_at desc
LIMIT
    ?
